name: Firebase Test: Rock, paper, scissors
description:
How to play:

  • Select Rock / Paper / Scissors.
  • Click any game from the game list.
  • Click Join a game.
  • See the board for result, I hope you win!

How to create:

  • Select Rock / Paper / Scissors.
  • Type in your message.
  • Click Open a game.
  • Ask your friend to join it, or play by yourself 😢

Sources:

  • Customize Radio Button CSS
  • Firebase CRUD Web App with Javascript
  • Web Development Tutorial - JavaScript, HTML, CSS - Rock Paper Scissors Game

Developed using HTML, CSS, JS, and Firebase

Get the project below.

How to setup your own project:

  • Create a Firebase account.
  • Go to the console.
  • Create new project.
  • Create new web app.
  • Copy the firebaseConfig of your new web app.
  • Download the project below.
  • Replace the firebaseConfig in file app.js with your app config.

Feel free to leave a comment if you need help.

Take care!
